alert.note: Alert for Davie; Iredell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Davie and northeastern Iredell Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Mocksville, or near Harmony, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mocksville, Harmony, Turnersburg, Olin, Sheffield, Farmington and Cool Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
